mapper.insert: insert into mkt_dtts_log (DTTS_LOG_ID, DTTS_TYPE, DTTS_STATE, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, DTTS_RESULT, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, REMARK_ONE, REMARK_TWO) values (#{dttsLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dttsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dttsState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dttsResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarkOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarkTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update mkt_dtts_log set
DTTS_TYPE = #{dttsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DTTS_STATE = #{dttsState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DTTS_RESULT = #{dttsResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK_ONE = #{remarkOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK_TWO = #{remarkTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DTTS_LOG_ID = #{dttsLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select DTTS_LOG_ID, DTTS_TYPE, DTTS_STATE, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, DTTS_RESULT, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, REMARK_ONE, REMARK_TWO from mkt_dtts_log where DTTS_LOG_ID = #{dttsLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select DTTS_LOG_ID, DTTS_TYPE, DTTS_STATE, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, DTTS_RESULT, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, REMARK_ONE, REMARK_TWO from mkt_dtts_log
and DTTS_TYPE = #{dttsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and CREATE_DATE >= #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} >= CREATE_DATE
order by BEGIN_TIME desc
